mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY WHERE CUSTOM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMMUNITY_NO , COMMUNITY_TITLE , COMMUNITY_STORY , COMMUNITY_WRITE_DATE , MEMBER_NO , CUSTOM ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMUNITY_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ communityTitle } , #{ communityStory } , SYSDATE , 1 , 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT A.COMMUNITY_NO , A.COMMUNITY_TITLE , A.COMMUNITY_STORY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.COMMUNITY_WRITE_DATE , C.FILE_NO , C.FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME , C.FILE_SAVED_NAME , C.FILE_PATH , C.FILE_SIZE , C.CUSTOM , C.THUMBNAILPATH FROM COMMUNITY A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT C ON (A.COMMUNITY_NO = C.COMMUNITY_NO) WHERE A.CUSTOM = 1 AND C.CUSTOM = 1 AND A.COMMUNITY_NO = #{ communityNo }
